comment.author: 73087214@N00
comment._content: Please, or you write the english name Michael Angel, or you will write in Italian the full and correct name, Michelangelo Buonarroti.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks. We have taken the titles for images in this group from a catalogue the Detroit Publishing Company used to market the images back in the early 1900s. But when we next update the description we can certainly include the name the artist is better known by, as you suggest.
